meanings: (지위·신분·자격) as, for, in the capacity[character] of

vlive.korean: 곡의 프로듀서 로서... 보잖아요. As the producer, I've seen the whole song. 듣기 View video Block B : 블락비의 'BEEUTIFUL'한 'YESTERDAY'
vlive.english: As the producer, I've seen the whole song.

vlive.korean: 저는 좀 개인적으로 저희 크나큰로서 놀러가는 거에 있어서요. We get to go on a real trip, as a group. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] KNK X EATING SHOW - 크나큰의 같이먹어요!
vlive.english: We get to go on a real trip, as a group.

vlive.korean: 다시 한 번 Assistant Chef 로서 말씀드리는데 얘네 미친 것 같아요. As a sous-chef, I'd like to say that these people are crazy. 듣기 View video V Special : [REPLAY] 진아식당, 개업식 (JIN-A RESTAURANT)
vlive.english: As a sous-chef, I'd like to say that these people are crazy.

examples.korean: reap the financial reward of his success as a breeder 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사육자(飼育者) 로서 성공하여 수입(收入)을 얻다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: reap the financial reward of his success as a breeder Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: he has held a supreme place as... 듣기 Add to Wordbook ... 그는 ...로서 최고의 지위에 있다. 영어영작문대사전

examples.korean: on completion of five years' service as... 듣기 Add to Wordbook ...로서 5년의 근무를 마친 후에. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: on completion of five years' service as... Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I am deeply conscious of my responsibility as... 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 ... 로서의 자신의 책임을 통감하고 있다. 영어영작문대사전

examples.korean: an estimate of ...may be got from the fact that... 듣기 Add to Wordbook ...의 사실 로서 ... 라는 추정을 할 수 있다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: an estimate of ...may be got from the fact that... Add to Wordbook
